meanings.definition: Showing or experiencing ecstasy or intense emotion
meanings.sent1: The ectatic fans cheered wildly as their team scored a goal.
meanings.sent2: The ectatic expression on her face revealed her joy at the surprise party.
meanings.sent3: The ectatic puppy wagged its tail happily, excited to see its owner.
